data.title: 100+ Bitcoin Live Casino Games at CoinCasino
data.description:
A Bitcoin Live Casino That’s Made For Crypto Players

Real dealers, real action, real opportunities – CoinCasino’s live casino is a crypto Player’s modern-day playground.

There are over 100 live games to choose from in the Bitcoin casino, and all of them can be enjoyed anonymously. Add lucrative bonuses to the mix, and it’s like getting a free pass to the table!

You may have seen streamers flexing their skills in blackjack, game shows, roulette, and baccarat. Now it's your turn to show up. No waiting around — just enter and play.

✨What Makes CoinCasino The Best Bitcoin Live Casino? 

CoinCasino is a licensed crypto casino that gives Players instant access to the action. Every day there’s a massive game library to explore that’s bursting with potential. 

1.  Top-Rated Live Crypto Casino Games

Not many Bitcoin live casinos bring the heat like we do. With 100+ live casino games from top dogs like Pragmatic Play you're in for a great time.

Our live crypto casino games range from classics to niche. Some Player favorites include:

  • Speed Baccarat: For lightning-fast rounds under 60 seconds.

  • Infinite Fun Fun 21 Blackjack: Double down with any decision.

  • Gravity Roulette: Get multipliers worth up to 1,000x your stake.

  • Extreme Texas Hold'Em: Classic poker with a modern twist.

  • Mega Sic Bo: Exciting dice game with big multipliers.

  • Monopoly Big Baller: Bingo-style gameplay at its finest.

2. Instant Payouts With Bitcoin & Crypto

Bitcoin withdrawals are instant when playing live casino. Whichever cryptocurrency you choose, you’ll receive your winnings at lightning speed. 

Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, Dogecoin, you name it, we’ve got it. We can easily process a large selection of cryptocurrencies, so you’re bound to find your crypto of choice to fund your play.

If you don’t have crypto to play live casino games, you can buy crypto directly through CoinCasino. All you need is a Visa or MasterCard. 

3. The Best Live Dealers a Casino Can Have

CoinCasino is home to the best live casino providers. Our games are hosted by professional dealers who are chill, fun, and super friendly. 

It's all about good vibes and an authentic atmosphere. To really get the most out of playing live casino games, use the interactive live chat mid-game and enjoy the dealers' fun personalities.

4. Fair and Secure Live Casino Play

CoinCasino is a fully licensed bitcoin casino. The casino games you’ll find here are certified as 100% fair. 

All games in the library go through regular audits from independent companies to make sure it stays that way.

5. Huge Crypto Betting Limits

If you’re looking to bet big – CoinCasino is your casino. Find VIP tables with high limits on live games and the option to play thousands per round or per hand. Your call!

Use your go-to betting strategies to make the most of this opportunity.

6. Live Games in Crystal-Clear Definition

All our live Bitcoin casino games stream in HD, with super crisp sound. So, you can chat with the live dealer in real time and enjoy watching the game unfold in different camera angles.

The interaction element means you can truly experience the rush of a real-life casino and almost feel like it’s the real deal.

🔥Live Dealer Crypto Games Turning Heads

When looking through the bitcoin live casino library, you won’t find any live casino games we don’t play ourselves. At CoinCasino, we care about quality, so we make sure to bring it.

We team up with the top devs to bring you the hottest live casino games that always deliver high-quality streaming, pro dealers, and a feeling of realism. The games are provided by Pragmatic Play, Live88, and ICONIC21.

1. Live Roulette

Nothing beats watching the roulette wheel spin in real-time. Add multipliers to the mix with Gold Vault Roulette and Gravity Roulette. Or, go wild with Double Ball Roulette, and get even more chances to win thanks to the extra ball. Then there's Immersive Roulette, which provides extra camera angles to offer an even more immersive playing experience.

2. Live Blackjack

An absolute classic for good reason! The goal? Beat the dealer's hand. Lightning Blackjack allows you to score multipliers up to 100x if you want extra excitement. Free Bet Blackjack is another popular option, as you get free split or double bets on certain hands.

3. Live Baccarat

Baccarat's a Player favorite for a reason. The low house edge gives you a better shot at winning compared to other table games. Place your bet on the player or banker's hand – it's that simple. Try Speed Baccarat if you want quicker gameplay or No Commission Baccarat to ditch the 5% house's cut for winning banker bets.

4. Live Game Shows

When you’re looking for fun and flair, head over to play live casino game shows. You can watch the Dream Catcher wheel spin, enjoy bingo-style Mega Ball or find some slot action with Monopoly Live.

Prefer dice games or card-based gameplay? Then check out Lightning Dice and Deal or No Deal Live.

Are Live Dealer Casino Games Fair at CoinCasino?

Yes 100%. CoinCasino is licensed by the authorities in Anjouan, so the casino practices are in line with the expectations and obligations that come with a gambling license. We're committed to total transparency so you can play with peace of mind. 

The live casino games on offer are from studios with spotless reputations and trust-worthy live dealers. The live streams are shown in HD quality, so you can clearly see every action as it happens in the game in real time. 

🎁Live Casino Bonuses & Promotions

Crypto bonuses aren't just for new Players. We've got live casino promos for everyone. The offers can change from time to time, so here's a sneak peek of what you’re in for:

Welcome Bonus

If you’re new to CoinCasino you can claim the crypto welcome bonus offering 200% first deposit bonus of up to $30,000 and 50 free spins. So you can dive into the hottest live casino games around.

VIP Loyalty Offers

At CoinCasino we take care of our players. If you're loyal, or like to play like a VIP, we've got some serious VIP rewards for you – everything from up to 25% weekly cashback and a VIP host. As you stack up loyalty points, you'll unlock even more generous bonuses and climb the ranks.

Cashback Bonuses

Cashback on losses is one of the most useful types of promotions to have in your back pocket. If you're on a losing streak when playing live casino, cashback bonuses are a nice boost. Qualifying players can get up to 25% of their losses back every week.

How To Play Bitcoin Live Casino Games at CoinCasino

If you’re feeling ready to get in on the action and play a live game. Follow these steps to get started:

1. Create Your CoinCasino Account

Start by signing up to CoinCasino. Add in the required information, create a username and password. Confirm you're of legal age and agree to the T&Cs. Boom, you're in!

2. Deposit Funds

Time to load up your account to play live casino games. Instantly deposit crypto whether it’s Bitcoin, Dogecoin, Ethereum, or any one of the available 10+ choices. You can even buy crypto directly through CoinCasino to fund your live play, with fiat currency using a credit or debit card.

By choosing crypto you can avoid hefty transaction fees. Just copy your CoinCasino crypto wallet address or scan the QR code and decide how much you want to add. 

3. Pick a Live Casino Game

Now that you have money in your account, you can browse our live casino. Click the game that catches your eye, and you can play instantly. Enjoy instant seating, with no loading screens you need to sit through.

4. Place Your Live Bets with Crypto

You’re ready to play live casino games! Choose between crypto and fiat to start placing your bets. Once everything's locked in, sit back and enjoy the game. 

5. Withdraw Your Winnings

If you're in the green, you can cash out using any of the cryptocurrency options. Copy your Bitcoin wallet address and send the funds. Payouts are instant, so they should hit your wallet in seconds.

Play Bitcoin Live Casino Games on Mobile, Desktop, or Tablet

You've got great flexibility when playing live casino games with CoinCasino. Play with anonymity on your laptop, mobile, or tablet. You'll always get the same smooth, user-friendly interface and all your favorite online casino games, no matter the device.

📱Plus, you can even jump into the action straight through CoinCasino's Telegram account. Easy, right?
